quotes.message: Your marriage is a glorious bond but don't take it as an easy task. It is meant to be worked upon similar to all of your other relationships.
quotes.name: Raymond Eido

quotes.message: Always strive to give your spouse the very best of yourself; not what's leftover after you have given your best to everyone else.
quotes.name: Dave Willis

quotes.message: Congratulations for embarking on life's journey called marriage which is either a two way street between compromise and sacrifice or a one way street to diivorce.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Happy marriages begin when we marry the ones we love and they blossom when we love the ones we marry.
quotes.name: Tom Mullen

quotes.message: We may argue and have our ups and downs, but any poor soul who ever tries to get between us will find out that our love is stronger than ever.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: To the newlyweds: May for better or worse be far better than worse.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: As you become husband and wife, prepare to welcome a lot of strife. Each others faults you will point out, you will fight and argue without a doubt. Don't even bother trying to find a solution, this is marriage life's toughest institution.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Putting love first, even above the laws of marriage, will allow you to see past the small, insignificant details and focus on the relationship you truly desire.
quotes.name: E'yen A.Gardner

quotes.message: Marriage is a form of discipline involving two people committing to a certain lifestyle and set of boundaries.
quotes.name: David Khalil

quotes.message: Have a good and godly marriage that shows the world Christ's love through how you sacrificially love and serve one another.
quotes.name: John Stange

quotes.message: Simply put, a marriage is not a marriage without the existence of two individuals who promised to love each other.
quotes.name: Jessica Gardner

quotes.message: From the first, the Bible makes clear that marriage is a calling from God to care for, bless, and serve another.
quotes.name: Adam Hamilton

quotes.message: Marriages are like fingerprints; each one is different and each one is beautiful.
quotes.name: Maggie Reyes

quotes.message: When two people become one by way of marriage, it is not only their hearts that are united, but their minds and souls as well.
quotes.name: Julie Donner Andersen

quotes.message: A young woman, newly wed, may find herself in the delightful position of wanting to do nothing without the company of her darling husband. She may indeed discover that she spends all her waking hours with her fellow to the exclusion of every other friend or family member. This is understandable, but wholly unacceptable, to society.
quotes.name: Anna Godbersen

quotes.message: The best time to love with your whole heart is always now, in this moment, because no breath beyond the current is promised.
quotes.name: Fawn Weaver

quotes.message: Newlyweds, they have this ideal, this picture of what marriage is like, something similar of their favorite memories growing up. If only it were that simple.
quotes.name: William Taylor

quotes.message: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Both people need to care deeply about the other person, to put the other's needs before their own, and to make a daily commitment to that person to stick it out.
quotes.name: Alessandra Torre

quotes.message: Marriage is the golden ring in a chain whose beginning is a glance and whose ending is eternity.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: We were married for better or worse. I couldn’t have done better, and she couldn’t have done worse.
quotes.name: Henny Youngman

quotes.message: Dear newlywed wife, somebody out there is determined to shape your view of intimacy and marriage.
quotes.name: Ngina Otiende

quotes.message: Compromise, communicate, and never go to bed angry - the three pieces of advice gifted and regifted to all newlyweds.
quotes.name: Gillian Flynn

quotes.message: The lonely evenings in the life of a newly married girl may be really agonizing.
quotes.name: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.message: I hope you smile, laugh, and maybe even learn something that will help you along the way to happily-ever-after.
quotes.name: T.N. Carpenter

quotes.message: Marriage: Love is the reason. Lifelong friendship is the gift. Kindness is the cause. Til’ death do us part is the length.
quotes.name: Fawn Weaver

quotes.message: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Motto for the bride and groom: We are a work in progress with a lifetime contract.
quotes.name: Phyllis Koss

quotes.message: Success? That's a strange choice of word. Usually, newlyweds are wished happiness.
quotes.name: Joan Crawford

quotes.message: Think about your marriage vows. It is easy to say them the day you get married and never give them any thought again. Say them to each other on your wedding anniversary.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Just because you have got married, it is no excuse to stop taking pride in your appearance. If you don't respect your own body, then it will be difficult for your partner to. Eat a healthy diet, and do some form of exercise at least once a week. You could even find a fun activity to do together.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Enjoy and cherish the things you do for the first time as a married couple and take lots of photos of those special moments.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Make the effort to learn about your partner's likes and dislikes, and remember the small details.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: If ever two were one, then surely we.
quotes.name: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.message: If you get married, make sure you keep a separate account of your own money as a safety net.
quotes.name: Yolanda Asher's mother

quotes.message: You may not be newlyweds but you can still kiss like you are.
quotes.name: Darlene Schacht

quotes.message: Newlyweds.
quotes.name: Don Pedro Aragon

quotes.message: You two, you're newlyweds, you're in love. God bless you, you know nothing.
quotes.name: Marie Barone

quotes.message: Newlyweds are always beautiful. They cannot fail to make the heart sing, for even the plainest faces are alive with promise.
quotes.name: Mature Jenny
